content.text:
# Astra Film Award for Best Actress

}}
The Astra Film Award for Best Actress is one of the annual awards given out by the Hollywood Creative Alliance.
Winners
* † = Winner of the Academy Award for Best Actress
* ‡ = Nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actress
